entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to stop Harry and Hermione from walking any farther. He is described as looking cautiously over the banisters.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who is with Harry and they are trying to stop them from walking any farther.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as the least favorite teacher of Harry at Hogwarts. He is described as having a dark, greasy-haired head and prominent nose.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who are trying to eavesdrop on Professor Snape.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who are trying to eavesdrop on Professor Snape.

relationships.description: Harry is observing what Professor Snape is doing for the Order of the Phoenix.
Fred and George are collaborating to eavesdrop on Professor Snape by using an Extendable Ear.
Harry is disapproving of Professor Snape's actions, as he is described as his least favorite teacher.
Fred and George are eavesdropping on Harry's conversation with Hermione.
